title: Hanchen the Hound

properties.name: description
properties.value: Hanchen the Hound is a thief who can be found in the Sisterhood Sanctuary beneath Slepe. He is the travelling companion of Hameln the Jester and the Painted One, and had travelled to Slepe after hearing about the town in a poem at the College of Bards in Varlamore.

Hanchen the Hound
Released24 May 2018 (Update)
MembersYes
RaceHuman
LocationSisterhood Sanctuary
QuestSins of the Father
GenderMale
OptionsTalk-to
Examine• Without any doubt, a rogue, a rascal, a villain, a thief and a scoundrel.
• The latest victim of the Sleeper Plague.
Map
Advanced data
NPC ID8278

Hanchen the Hound is a thief who can be found in the Sisterhood Sanctuary beneath Slepe. He is the travelling companion of Hameln the Jester and the Painted One, and had travelled to Slepe after hearing about the town in a poem at the College of Bards in Varlamore.

During Sins of the Father, he is found in the Slepe church, having contracted the Sleeper Plague.

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations with this NPC.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Hanchen's examine text is a quote from the 1972 musical drama film 1776.
